title: Rocky Christmas
description: She’s the only thing he wants for Christmas, but she’s the senator’s daughter and off limits.RockyI'm supposed to be preparing for my upcoming MMA fight, but then I see her, and all bets are off. She's the prettiest little thing I've ever seen, and I'll die if I don't find out who she is.HollyNo one has ever approached me the way the big, muscled-up guy in the bar does. I know my father won't approve. I know what's expected of me, but Rocky is looking at me like I'm his salvation, and would it be so bad to have something just for me? This Christmas I'm going to treat myself. It'll be our little secret. I'm just going to get to know him. That's all.That's what I tell myself anyway.
author: Emma Bray
